data.title: Angela Aki collaborates with...Van Gogh?!
data.meta_description: Singer Angela Aki (33) held a mini concert on June 7th and 8th at the Washington National Gallery Exhibit, located in the New National Art Gallery iâ€¦
data.text:
Concerts / Events

Posted by amapi0 pt Wednesday, June 8, 2011

Angela Aki collaborates with...Van Gogh?!

Singer Angela Aki (33) held a mini concert on June 7th and 8th at the Washington National Gallery Exhibit, located in the New National Art Gallery in Roppongi, Tokyo.

The concert was held to celebrate the opening of the exhibit, and she performed 4 songs, including her new single (and the exhibit's theme song) "I Have a Dream" and its accompanying song "Hajimari no Ballad" in front of the 500 attendees.The single went on sale the same day as the event and was available in a limited version for event attendees only.

The CD jacket of the limited version featured Vincent van Gogh's famous self-portrait. "This is my most favorite piece of art. It's like a dream to be able to collaborate [with van Gogh]".

Source + Photo: Sanspo
